definitions.definition: A hydraulic or electric platform that installs onto the rear of a vehicle and which may be raised or lowered in the loading and unloading of heavy cargo .
A closure at the rear of a vehicle , or rear door , that can be raised to access the back of a vehicle .

main_definition: ( truck equipment ) A hydraulic or electric platform that installs onto the rear of a vehicle and which may be raised or lowered in the loading and unloading of heavy cargo .
secondary_definitions: ( automotive ) A closure at the rear of a vehicle , or rear door , that can be raised to access the back of a vehicle .
